sca:policySet.name: tuscany:TransactionBindingPolicySet
sca:policySet.provides: managedTransaction noManagedTransaction propagatesTransaction suspendsTransaction transactedOneWay immediateOneWay

intent.name: managedTransaction
intent.description: Used to indicate the transaction environment desired by a component implementation.

intent.name: managedTransaction.global
intent.description: Used to indicate that a component implementation requires a managed global transaction.

intent.name: managedTransaction.local
intent.description: Used to indicate that a component implementation requires a managed local transaction.

intent.name: noManagedTransaction
intent.description: Used to indicate that a component implementation will manage its own transaction resources.

intent.name: propagatesTransaction
intent.description: Used to indicate that a reference will propagate any client transaction or that a service will be dispatched under any received transaction.

intent.name: suspendsTransaction
intent.description: Used to indicate that a reference will not propagate any client transaction or that a service will not be dispatched under any received transaction.

intent.name: transactedOneWay
intent.description: Used to indicate that the component requires the SCA runtime to transact OneWay send of messages as part of any client global transaction or to transact oneWay message receipt as part of any service global transaction.

intent.name: immediateOneWay
intent.description: Used to indicate that the component requires the SCA runtime to process the sending or receiving of OneWay messages immediately, regardless of any transaction under which the sending/receiving component runs.
